title: Episode 142 | "Sean's House"
description: After a week of festering, Joe revisits his beef with Complex and gives more insight on his departure (15:22). The guys also discuss Cardi B’s new single, Offset cheating, and her ongoing tension with Nicki Minaj (57:32). Although there are plenty of jokes this episode, the guys get serious and pay homage to Reggie Osse, better known as “Combat Jack” (50:32). We ended 2017 with a million views in a week, shout out to the fans for rocking with us. We’ll be back in 2018. Other topics include: -Akademiks beefing on twitch (17:57) -Ebro vs Mal in dodgeball/Rory vs Mal in 1 on 1 (1:05:31) -Lavar Ball’s new basketball league (1:22:44) -Joe addresses Kevin Hart’s interview (1:28:50) Sleeper picks of the week: Joe: Timbaland (featuring 6lack) “Grab the Wheel” | https://youtu.be/DL8UDmRWAzc Rory: Jordan Bratton “Pieces” | https://youtu.be/ZADjYmyUD3s Mal: Conway “Bishop Shot Steel” | https://soundcloud.com/gxfr/07-bishop-shot-steel-produced
